item.title: UFO sightings in Sweden
item.description:
UFO Sightings in Sweden ðŸ”—

This article documents alleged UFO sightings within Sweden.

1946 ðŸ”—

This section details two notable events from 1946. The first is the wave of “ghost rockets,” mysterious rocket-shaped objects sighted extensively in Sweden and nearby Scandinavian countries between May and December. Thousands of sightings were reported, with some tracked on radar and physical fragments allegedly recovered. The second event is the alleged Ã„ngelholm UFO incident, where businessman GÃ¶sta Carlsson claimed to have witnessed a UFO landing in a forest near Ã„ngelholm and encountered humanoid occupants.

2009 ðŸ”—

This section focuses on the 2009 Norwegian spiral anomaly, a spiral-shaped light phenomenon observed over Norway and Sweden. The event involved a blue beam of light with a greyish spiral emanating from one end.

See also ðŸ”—

This section provides a link to the main “List of reported UFO sightings” Wikipedia page, allowing readers to explore a broader range of global UFO incidents.

References ðŸ”—

This section contains a single reference to an article from Universe Today titled “What was the Norway Spiral?” by Nancy Atkinson, dated December 9, 2009.

External links ðŸ”—

This section provides an external link to the MUFON (Mutual UFO Network) website, specifically to a page displaying the last 20 UFO sightings and pictures reported to the organization.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UFO_sightings_in_Sweden
